title: re: Niles typeface?
content:
Hello fellow Typophiles,

I have been asked to find the source foundry for a type face called Niles.  
I have never heard of this font before.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you and have a fun and safe holiday season.

Regards,

Sal
author: sal_randazzo

comments.content:
Maybe... Miles?

[http://www.myfonts.com/person/newlyn/miles/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130216011251/http:/www.myfonts.com/person/newlyn/miles/ "http://www.myfonts.com/person/newlyn/miles/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/person/miles/john/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130216011251/http:/www.myfonts.com/person/miles/john/ "http://www.myfonts.com/person/miles/john/")

Searching for the source of the Niles ;-)

Perhaps they’re pulling your sphinx!
I think (appropriately enough) there was an Egyptian (slab-serif) type called Nile (no s) - is that what you're looking for?

Hello sii and eliason,

Thank you for checking. I found the Niles sans serif font from csaimages.com ...  
csa fonts.

Regards,

Sal Randazzo
